name: Terminal Hellocity
description:
Terminal Hellocity is the world's most-watched gameshow! Today's contender, Danger Dave, defies the gods of gravity and jumps from a plane towards his certain death!

Jump out of the plane and steer your diver towards the landing point and earn as many points as possible! Watch out though, terminal velocity can be a bit tricky to handle and a single hit to one of the obstacles will cause poor Dave to go unconscious and plummet to earth with even less control than he had before!

Made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme we had was "Out of Control"

Use WASD to steer the diver as best as you can, in case you get stuck press the "Escape" key to stop the session.

Credits 

Rocco - Programming
DOMO - Programming
Vytautas - Effects
Jeebs - Art
BenjaminArk / Arvank - Art
Candle King - Audio
